name: Shelter (itch) (Bear-Infested Waters)
description:
You have only one goal. Stay alive!

This is our simple (but completed!) Ludum Dare 46 project. The sound is barely there. The animation are minimalist, but it is ours. 

Survive the day in your flimsy shed. Fend off the zombies, but be sure not to starve in the process!
